titleStmt.title: R. P. D. D. IOANNES PARKHURSTUS Episcopus Noruvicensis ad Thomam Baeconum.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: R. P. D. D. IOANNES PARKHURSTUS Episcopus Noruvicensis ad Thomam Baeconum.

monogr.title: The displaying of the Popish masse : vvherein thou shalt see, what a wicked idoll the masse is, and what great difference there is between the Lords Supper and the Popes Masse: againe, what Popes brought in every part of the masse, and counted it together in such monstrou sort, as it is now used in the Popes kingdome. Written by Thomas Becon; and published in the dayes of Queene Mary
monogr.author: Becon, Thomas

div.head: R. P. D. D. IOANNES PARKHURSTUS Episcopus Noruvicensis ad Thomam Baeconum.
div.l: Quo tua nonpridem sancta Minerva dedito
Dispercam siquid legi unquam sanctius, aut si
Quid potuit populo tradier ut liu • .
Auspice perge Deo tales vulgare libellos,
Variloquax sed nec lingua timenda tibi est.
Sic Christum possis avido iaculare popello,
